Transfer with confidence - when moving images and other files from computer to computer or other Consumer electronic devices

body.description: From the manufacturer from the manufacturer with USB ports popping up everywhere you look, you need a simple and reliable way to store and share your photos, videos and music on the fly. The SanDisk Cruzer USB flash drive is your answer. Because it works with virtually any computer or electronic device with a USB slot, This flash drive lets you leave your laptop at home but still take your Vast amounts of content with you to share with family and friends. Whether you need to transport your latest MP3 downloads, vacation videos, or your college thesis, the SanDisk Cruzer USB flash drive offers portable storage that you can trust. Convenient storage and portability with USB ports on computers, to new ports popping up on cars, DVD players, TVs, photo frames, and more, The need for a fast and reliable way to share your digital content on a moment's notice is greater than ever. The SanDisk Cruzer USB flash drive Meets that need. This reliable flash drive fits in the palm of your hand and gives you the storage capacity you need to store and transfer up to 16 GB of data. While the drive is optimized for laptops and devices with USB 2.0 port, It is backwards compatible with older devices that have USB 1.1 ports, so you can be assured of near universal compatibility. View videos without extra software or setup with the SanDisk Cruzer USB flash drive, you can transfer your favorite video from one device to another easily and conveniently, without any additional software or setup. The drive offers drag-and-drop convenience, which means you can simply drag the files from your device onto your SanDisk Cruzer flash drive, or vice versa, without any steps. Transferring video files from computer to computer, or from your drive to a USB-enabled DVD player, is incredibly simple. Drag your video files from your PC to your USB flash drive and then plug the drive into your DVD player -- or even your USB-enabled TV -- and sit back to enjoy the show.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 676 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for music. The sound reproduction is outstanding. Product and price are high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great little thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: I put a lot of family pictures that was sent to me in emails from relatives of family members that have passed away, and wanted to give it to my mother to put on her computer. She doesn't have internet, and just basically just plays games on hers. So I thought this would be nice to take over to her place and put it on her computer. Pictures with her parents and their relatives, her sister and her family. It gives her something sentimental to look at other than just playing games. Memories. So this was perfect for what I needed it for. Pictures don't take up a lot of space, and this size was perfect for me. You can't go wrong with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, cheap, but gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: These drives are PERFECT for use with 3D printers and other microprocessor-based devices that can't handle larger drives. One of my printers has to have this specific size for firmware upgrades. Great "sneakernet" drives for non-networked devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SanDisk Cruzers are always dependable.
reviews.reviewText: I have an older car stereo that only supports 8GB USB flash drives and SanDisk is the ONLY brand that works perfectly on my JVC stereo - including the scorching heat inside the car. I've tried several other brand names in this size and they either don't work properly (not supporting international standards) OR they fail after a couple of weeks. I still have an old Cruzer that's 10 years old (baking in the car in the summer heat and freezing in the winter) that still functions just fine. SanDisk for the win... again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2012
reviews.reviewText: I purchased four of these to have in my desk as quick go-to drives. While I didn't test speed/throughput, since that really wasn't a factor for me, here are my impressions.1. Flimsy plastic housing - normally the USB plug of a flash drive is metal and plugs into a metal port. This one is flimsy plastic (similar to the plastic on a plastic spoon) It flexes when pressed. In fact the entire housing is a thin plastic shell making it extra "light" but also not confidence inspiring. That said, I'm sure they tested these to stand up to constant insertions and withdraws. The case is contoured slightly to assist in puling it out of the USB port.2. Small - About the size of my thumb. Not the smallest on the market, but small enough to be called "tiny"3. Cheap - cheapest "SanDisk" brand name flash drive I could find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for IT
reviews.reviewText: It’s becoming harder to find small capacity drives from reputable brands for specific jobs. Some computer motherboards won’t let you flash the bios with higher capacity drives. They also are great for making bootable recovery tools and installation media.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect drives for windows installation media

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's not to like - they work as they should.

reviews.reviewText: Amazing product have used it for last 3 years. Never ran into any issue. Economical and great product. Loved it

reviews.reviewTitle: one isworking properly and the other one within 2 weeks showing like its not
reviews.reviewText: In two pendrives, one isworking properly and the other one within 2 weeks showing like its not detectable
